name: Clonezilla
description: Clonezilla is a system cloning tool. Not only does it support cloning the complete system, but also can clone single partition. Meanwhile, it supports various file system formats, backup and restoring files in Linux.

en_US.description: Clonezilla is a system cloning tool. Not only does it support cloning the complete system, but also can clone single partition. Meanwhile, it supports various file system formats, backup and restoring files in Linux.
en_US.name: Clonezilla

zh_CN.description: Clonezilla是一个系统克隆工具，它不仅支持对整个系统进行克隆，还支持单个分区克隆，同时还具有支持Linux下各种文件系统格式、备份和还原文件。
zh_CN.name: Clonezilla
